instruction.company_name: Use official registered name only. | Avoid abbreviations unless globally recognized (e.g., IBM). | Apply Title Case. | Example: **Google LLC.**
instruction.designation: Write the exact internship title. | Capitalize each word. | Example: **Software Engineering Intern.**
instruction.duration: Format: **MMM YYYY – MMM YYYY** (or *Present* if ongoing). | Example: *Jun 2024 – Aug 2024.*
